description.value:
Consumable (Ammunition)

When triggered, this enhanced flechette cannon ammunition fires a volley of ion flechette rounds in a short line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide or a long line 45 feet long and 5 feet wide. A single flechette mag holds enough ammunition for three attacks in a short line or one attack in a long line. Each creature must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes [[/r 7d6]] ion damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one. Any electronics within the blast radius that aren't being worn or carried are disabled until rebooted.

Â 

Flechette mag, ion

When triggered, this flechette cannon ammunition fires a volley of ion flechette rounds in a short line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide or a long line 45 feet long and 5 feet wide. A single flechette mag holds enough ammunition for three attacks in a short line or one attack in a long line. Each creature must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes [[/r 2d6]] ion damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one. Any electronics within the blast radius that aren't being worn or carried are disabled until rebooted.
